strapiPost.title: Exhibit Featuring Local Artists On Display At Walton Arts Center
strapiPost.content:
For the second year, the Our Art, Our Region, Our Time exhibition is on display in the Joy Pratt Markham Gallery at the Walton Arts Center, featuring art from the regionâ€™s diverse community. 

  • Locally sourced: The exhibition includes over 90 pieces of art by 75 artists from the region, and display themes of isolation and self-reflection. 
  • Check it out: The exhibit opens tonight with a reception at 5-7p, and can be viewed weekdays 10a-2p or the hour prior to performances and during intermission. 

See a full list of the artists and their work HERE.
